## Bio

I'm Kshitij Duraphe. I work on human-computer interaction, reinforcement learning, foundation models, and related topics in AI/ML. I'm a May 2024 graduate from Boston University's Master of Electrical and Computer Engineering program.

## Research Interests

**Theory**: Astrophysics and the application of inverse methods to astrophysical phenomena. SciML methods for faster and more reliable scientific understanding.

**Practice**: Fast, efficient, and scalable multimodal signal and image processing systems for engineering problems in unstructured, noisy, and sparse scenarios.
